VariableName: This data is collected from the nss 73rd round.
Long_Description: This data is collected from the NSS 73rd round.

VariableName: Medium and small scale industrial units
Long_Description: Number of Units in Lakh. Medium and small scale industrial units in lakh. Figures are based on First All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1972. Figures of Daman & Diu were included in the erstwhile state of Goa, Daman & Diu, before it got delinked as a separate Union Territory. Second All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1987-88. Third All-India Census of Small Scale Industries 2001-02. Fourth All-India Census of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 2006-07. NSS 73rd round (July 2015-June 2016).

Total investment in crore. Investments made for plant and machinery or equipment in crore. Figures are based on First All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1972. Figures of Daman & Diu were included in the erstwhile state of Goa, Daman & Diu, before it got delinked as a separate Union Territory. Second All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1987-88. Third All-India Census of Small Scale Industries 2001-02. Fourth All-India Census of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 2006-07. NSS 73rd round (July 2015-June 2016).

Total Production in crore. Total amount spent on production of goods. Figures are based on First All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1972. Figures of Daman & Diu were included in the erstwhile state of Goa, Daman & Diu, before it got delinked as a separate Union Territory. Second All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1987-88. Third All-India Census of Small Scale Industries 2001-02. Fourth All-India Census of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 2006-07. NSS 73rd round (July 2015-June 2016).

Total Employment in Lakh. Persons employed in medium and small industries in lakh. Figures are based on First All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1972. Figures of Daman & Diu were included in the erstwhile state of Goa, Daman & Diu, before it got delinked as a separate Union Territory. Second All-India Census of Small Scale Industrial Units 1987-88. Third All-India Census of Small Scale Industries 2001-02. Fourth All-India Census of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 2006-07. NSS 73rd round (July 2015-June 2016).
